title: Calories in Sausage
meta_description: Discover calories in sausage, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: One standard cooked pork sausage link (56 g), pan-fried without added fat; typical breakfast or dinner sausage.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (pork, beef, chicken), brand, size, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cooked pork sausage (56 g) contains about 194 kcal and 7.7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one sausage?
faqs.a: About 194 kcal for one cooked pork sausage (56 g).

faqs.q: What is the protein in sausage?

faqs.a: Yes, about 17.7 g total fat, including 6 g saturated, per sausage.
Approximately 346 kcal per 100 g cooked pork sausage.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect sausage calories?
faqs.a: Yes; grilling is lower than frying with added oil, which can add 40+ kcal.
